title: SmartNews
description:
Your news in one minute. Get the award-winning, addictively simple news app loved by millions. Our proprietary algorithm analyzes 13+ million articles a day to deliver the top trending stories from the sources you trust: NBC News, TechCrunch, The Huffington Post, Bleacher Report, Quartz, The Verge, Vox.com, Reuters, AP, Perez Hilton and more.

Discover what’s trending around the world -- right now.

Lightning fast, zero loading time -- read offline.

Optimized for readability -- no fluff.

“Very minimalistic and simple to use.” - Paste

“With an interface that lets you browse headlines quickly, customize your channels and read the news offline, SmartNews is an excellent free alternative to other popular news apps.” - CNET

“Flick through the headlines, click on an article, and the text renders beautifully. Without Internet!” - FastCompany

--

SmartNews may use your current location to provide accurate weather forecasting, articles specific to your area, and enhance your social media options.
short_desc: Your news in one minute. Zero loading time, a beautiful interface.
what_is_new:
Made a small performance improvement.
Enjoy our SmartView for a clean, trouble-free reading experience. "Related Articles," at the bottom of every article in SmartView, will help you dive deeply into the stories that matter to you. And "Read More," at the bottom of every channel, ensures there's always something to discover in your favorite channels.
SmartNews - Discover your world every day
